skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine ¨C U-81.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm U-81, Type VIIC submarine of the Iron Blood Navy. I have a ton of sisters who can be pretty unruly sometimes! ... Also, I have the sinking of Ark Royal under my belt! She's a weird woman... I can't properly explain what makes her weird, though...
skins.acquisition: Heheh, now I too have a commander! I'm U-81, I love playing hide-and-seek. If you can't find me, just shout "U-81, I admit defeat!" and I'll probably come out of hiding.
skins.login: So you're finally back, huh. I thought I was gonna die of boredom.
skins.details: Booooom! Did I scare ya there, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm gonna go check around the office for places to hide. Hehehe...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Adjust firing parameters... check the compass and scales... Clank, clunk... *Giggle*...
skins.secretaryIdle3: How about a game of hide-and-seek, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Bombers?! Aaaahhhh! Commander, there are some things you just can't joke about!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whoah?! I warned you about doing that, Commander! My torpedoes almost just went off...

skins.shipDescription: *Ugh*... I figured this bulky dress would be hard to move in... Huh? I look pretty? Aha, ahaha... You're makin' me blush...
skins.acquisition: *Ugh*... I figured this bulky dress would be hard to move in... Huh? I look pretty? Aha, ahaha... You're makin' me blush...
skins.login: You're LATE, Commander! Just how long are you gonna keep me waiting?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This isn't wine, it's a soft drink! Don't believe me? Then have a sip for yourself! C'mon!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Err, you wanna dance with me...? B-b-b-but I have no idea how to dance...
skins.secretaryIdle3: This here kitty is my personal butler! Whaddya think? Is that awesome or what?
skins.secretaryTouch: You wanna hear me play the piano? Errm... I-in a bit, so just hold on a few...!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
